item.description:
September 13th
8pm-12am

FREE Lesson 8pm; Dancing starts at 9

*** Disclaimer: This is NOT for the weak at heart.
Get ready to work up a sweat!

Come for the lesson, Stay for the dancing!
Join us for a very special Salsa Jam September 13!

We will be featuring our DJ JAM SESSION with DJ Rob Suave and DJ Travieso spinning the best Salsa All night long!


Back in school? New to Boston? Looking for one last great back to school party? Look no more! Join us this Saturday!

For those who are looking for some GREAT, IRRESISTIBLE music...
And For those who JUST WANT TO DANCE!
Great Venue, Great Music, Great People, and EVEN BETTER DANCERS!

*******************************

With DJ Rob Suave and DJ Travieso Spinning the Hottest Salsa to keep you
ON YOUR FEET!

*******************************

*** Disclaimer: This is NOT for the weak at heart. Get ready to work up a sweat!

Party for ONLY $8!

Cash Bar...Plenty of FREE Parking...Warm, Family Vibe...All Ages Welcome

We'll see you there!!!!!!!!

*******************************

Location: Knights of Columbus; 75 West School St.; Charlestown, MA 02129
Public Transportation & Driving Directions

*******************************

This is the 2nd to last social for 2008! There will be no October or November social! Don't miss out!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sheila & Jason during the class!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Beantown Salsa Jam with Masacote! JAM of the DJs!
